transform_def.name: epolar_strip
transform_def.string: let tmp = dot(p_in, p_in) + t z = complex(p_in.y, p_in.x) result = halfinvpi() * log((z * tmp) + (z * tmp)) epolar = vec2(result.im, result.re) cpx = clamp(epolar.x, -0.5, 0.5) cpy = clamp(epolar.y, 0.0, 0.5) rpolar = lerp(vec2(cpx, cpy), vec2(-cpx, -cpy), if unit_rnd_0 >= 0.5 then 1.0 else 0.0) log_out = vec2(rpolar.y, rpolar.x + floor(log(unit_rnd_2) * (if unit_rnd_1 < 0.5 then strength else -strength) + 0.5)) * (weight * 2.0) in log_out
